system.description: If your hold is secure and your rule unchallenged, at the beginning of the session, roll+hard.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, or if your hold is compromised or your rule contested, your hold is in want.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a 7–9, you have surplus, but choose 1 want.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a 10+, you have surplus at hand and available for the needs of the session.

system.choices: The precise values of your surplus and want depend on your holding.
